profile:
Appliance Repair Experts, Servicing All Brands of Major Household Appliances In The Greater Vancouver Area. Washer Repair, Dryer Repair, Oven Repair, Dishwasher Repair, Stove Repair, Fridge Repair. Call Or Book Online

We are Licensed & Insured Repair Technicians Available 24/7. Over 10 Years Experience. Call Now. Proudly Owned and Operated in Metro Vancouver. Locally Owned & Operated. Service All Major Brands. Emergency Repair. Services: Repair, Installation, Maintenance, Vent Cleaning.

We specialize services In The Greater Vancouver Area. Our technicians have most of the appliances parts. If you need your appliances repaired, then give us a Call! or Book Online
Our jobs are guaranteed. We give warranty on parts and labour.
